communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents, emails, text messages and calendar entries from the leadership of the Office of the Secretary of Defense that mention the term "Signal," referring to the encrypted messaging application. The leadership I am referring to includes Pete Hegseth, Steve Feinberg and Christopher Grady. I am requesting records from January 21, 2025 until the present day.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matt Bernardini

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Encrypted Communications ODNI
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents, emails, text messages and calendar entries from the leadership of the Office of the Director of National Intelligence that mention the term "Signal," referring to the encrypted messaging application. By leadership of ODNI, I am including referring to the following individuals: Tulsi Gabbard, Lora Shiao, Michele Bredenkamp, Trent Maul, Kulika Frazier, Don Holstead, Mark Frownfelter, Diana DiCarlo, Dana Madsen, Rebecca Richards and Tamara Johnson. I am requesting records from January 21, 2025 until the present day.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matt Bernardini
